name: Asa - PianoBulae Work #Q4
description:
"Asa" (Hope) manipulates the mind and provides an infinite platform for the soul to dance with no end 

Piano Meets Granular Sampler in quarantine time. Part of a series entitled “PianoBulae Works”. Constructed entirely from fragments of a solo improvisation on an upright acoustic piano, recorded in 2016 and later manipulated on 2018 by granular sampler trough the eurorack system. 

All visuals are made in quarantine time
